title: Tasker 6.0 beta adds simple ‘Tasky’ UI for automation novices
content:
If there is one criticism leveled at Tasker, it’s the ease at which first-timers can get into the automation app. Thanks to Tasker 6.0 beta, a new easy mode UI called “Tasky” could change the experience for beginners and novices.

more…

The post Tasker 6.0 beta adds simple ‘Tasky’ UI for automation novices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Tasker 6.0 beta is introducing a new easy mode UI called "Tasky" that could change the experience for beginners and novices.
